CustomField.formula: IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")& "/forms/support/?"& "&acc="& Account__c & "&con=" & Job_Contact__c & "&jid="& Job__c & "&sid="& Job__r.Site__r.Id & "&job="& Job__r.Name & "&cli="&SUBSTITUTE( Account__r.First_Name__c , " ", "%20")&"%20"&SUBSTITUTE( Account__r.Last_Name__c , " ", "%20")& "&ema="& Account_Email_Address__c & "&pho="& SUBSTITUTE(Account__r.Phone, " ", "")
CustomField.label: Support Form URL
